summary: Chris Campoli  is a Canadian professional ice hockey player that currently plays for the Montreal Canadiens of the National Hockey League as a defencemen.
full_text: Christopher Gino Campoli  is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who currently plays for HV71 in the Swedish Hockey League. He has previously played with the Chicago Blackhawks, Ottawa Senators, New York Islanders, and Montreal Canadiens in the National Hockey League.
title: Chris Campoli
